Author: shrinkingviolet85
Text: Can you go to the original restaurant by yourself? Call it a self care date.

Author: Dalos_
Text: I’m so sorry. I get how frustrating it is for that ONE thing that was going to be okay and alright and safe and special to be just... ripped away like that. It’s honestly devastating but from the outside it’s no big deal to people. When we only get meals like that once in a blue moon, they start to mean everything and are more than just the food.
